newsitem.title: CHINA: African Development Bank launches 30 bln yen bond.
newsitem.headline: African Development Bank launches 30 bln yen bond.

text.p: The African Development Bank has launched a 30 billion yen subordinated Eurobond to be priced later on Wednesday in London, lead manager Goldman Sachs said.
The bond matures in August 2002 and will be priced to yield 22 basis points over the Japanese Government Bond 148.
The issue is rated Aa1 by Moody's Investors Service and AA-minus by Standard and Poor's Corp.
